title: STAT+: Pharmalittle: We’re reading about a Trump setback over 340B, stopping obesity drugs, and more
description: U.S. appeals court refused to allow the Trump administration to proceed with a pilot program that would alter payments through the 340B drug discount program
content: U.S. appeals court refused to allow the Trump administration to proceed with a pilot program that would alter payments through the 340B drug discount program
